directions: In a blender or food processor blend the cream, the vinegar, the mustard, the shallot, the sugar, and the lemon juice until the mixture is combined well, with the motor running add the oil in a stream, and blend the vinaigrette until it is emulsified. Add salt and pepper to taste and serve the vinaigrette over asparagus.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Dijon-style mustard or to taste
2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice, or to taste
title: Creamy Mustard Vinaigrette for Asparagus
